alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 23 at 6:37PM MDT until March 23 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 228, 229, 230, 232, AND 233... It will remain breezy across the southern I-25 corridor region with winds of 10 to 20 mph through the evening. However, as temperatures cool, the humidity values will increase, In addition, A weak cool front will move across the region late this evening increasing the humidity values.
